name: NONE: Shape Your Universe. (iOS, OUYA, Android, Windows ++!)
blurb: You... are N.O.N.E. An entity that transcends space and time. Guide the beings known as the SUM toward chaos, reason or harmony.

rewards.reward: Why not? You get bragging rights because YOU... ARE A KICKSTARTER BACKER! Aside from our gratitude you will also get an exclusive NONE desktop wallpaper graphic in your inbox.  Thanks!

Get a copy of NONE when it is released on OUYA!  We'll also give you access to an exclusive backer forum in which we will blog top-secret game art, proofs, play tests and more. You'll also get the desktop wallpaper.
You will receive all of the above AND you will be invited into early beta access for NONE on OUYA!

Receive the above rewards, and get a Kickstarter exclusive PDF art book featuring over 20 pages of concept art, early game sketches and more! With that book, we'll also send you a quick-link to a quality print-on-demand site in case you want to purchase a print copy. This book will not be available to the general public.\r\n\r\n$40 level backers will also get a digital copy of the game's soundtrack.

Supergamer. Get all of the above rewards, plus an exclusive to Kickstarter "subscription" as more NONE content emerges, you'll get it!  We don't have a definitive list of this content yet, but there will be various ways to expand and enhance your game, characters, landscapes and the Kickstarter Supergamer will be privy to all of these.\r\n\r\nBut that's not all, we'll also throw in an extra early beta access invitation... +1 for the party!

Receive ALL of the above rewards AND you'll get a very cool button pack with two limited-run hand-pressed NONE buttons, two buttons each from other game projects we've worked on. (studio pick)\r\n\r\nAt this level we will also add one MORE (total three invitations) early beta access invitation. Your christmas gifts for your mom and dad are taken care of because now they can both play the none early beta with you!

Receive all $80 and under rewards AND get a limited edition (300) hand-screened signed and numbered print and your name (or an appropriate name of your choice) will be added to the random list of SUM character names. Also get a special thanks in the game's credits!

Or, maybe you are more prone to wear your art... Receive all $80 and under rewards and get a limited edition (300) hand-screened signed and numbered T-SHIRT and your name (or an appropriate name of your choice) will be added to the random list of SUM character names. Also get a special thanks in the game's credits!

Get all the $80 and under rewards PLUS a high quality print of a SUM of your choice (Neutral, Chaos, Harmony, or Reason). You'll also get the limited edition hand printed shirt and poster and a special thanks in the game's credits!
Get all the $80 and under rewards PLUS a high quality 20x30 NONE poster signed by the studio. Also get a special thanks in the game's credits!
Don't have an OUYA? We'll send you one with CUSTOM NONE CONCEPT ART!... and all the 80$ and below rewards!  Get a rare collectable console, test and play the game!

Get your SUM on.  You will get every previously listed reward and from photos you send us we will customize a SUM character for you.. this will be hand drawn from one of our illustrator/animators in pen/ink with marker.  We'll matte and frame it for you and ship it out. The art will be one of a kind and signed by the artist.

Executive Producer!

In addition to all other rewards, hang with our humble studio in Lancaster, PA! We'll fly you here for a long weekend.  We’ll go to Philadelphia by train one day and see some sights and landmarks and we’ll go out to where the Amish live and eat some crazy fresh food and relive the benevolent parts of the movie Witness.... what’s even more fun is we’ll hang at the studio and play NES, Wii, Xbox and Ouya and talk about games.  Courtland will likely spoil every game and movie you were thinking of playing/watching. It'll be a blast.

Email us for more info.  If you are from out of the country, we will discuss splitting airfare.  You'll get all of your other rewards as soon as we have them.
